channel.title: Thyroid on Academia
channel.description: Recent content in Thyroid on Academia

item.title: Thyroid Health
item.description:
We propose that dietary changes, ecological disruptions of co-evolutionary processes during pregnancy and with pathogens, emerging infections and exacerbated stress responses can contribute to explaining the onset of thyroid diseases.

This is project together with BOOST Thyroid and Sarai Keestra (Netherlands).

** Relevant publication ** Sarai Keestra, Vedrana HÃ¶gqvist Tabor, Alexandra Alvergne, Reinterpreting Patterns of Variation in Human Thyroid Function: An Evolutionary Perspective, Evolution, Medicine, and Public Health, , eoaa043, https://doi.org/10.1093/emph/eoaa043
